Medicines and breastfeeding
Many illnesses, including 
depression (see page 90), 
can be treated while you are 
breastfeeding without harming 
your baby. Small amounts  
of whatever medicines you 
take will pass through your 
breastmilk to your baby, so 
always tell your doctor
